findings.title: Uninitialized variables
findings.description: The isMinted mapping is never initialized and when it is called in mintNft(), the require statement will always pass and the mint function will never revert.

findings.title: Address casting
findings.description: The gallery address in the updateTokenInfo() function is casted and assigned as a payable parameter but the TokenStructLibrary holds a non-payable address instead.

findings.title: Recursive imports
findings.description: The majority of contracts, interfaces and libraries imported into the LazyMinting.sol contract file already have been imported in previous contracts.

findings.title: Spellings and Solidity Style Guide Formatting
findings.description: In the mintNft function, there is a misspelling of one of the parameters as remaningfee. Also some functions could be declared in NATSPEC format, and following the Solidity Style Guide formatting.

findings.title: Missing events for changes to state
